2. Installing dnpLab¶

2.1. Required Packages¶

The following packages are required to run dnpLab:

Package

Version

NumPy

1.19 or higher

SciPy

1.5 or higher

Matplotlib

3.3 or higher

h5py

2.10 or higher

PyQt5

5.15

2.2. Installing with pip¶

dnpLab can be installed using pip. In a terminal simply type the following command:

$ python -m pip install dnpLab

If you prefer to install dnpLab from the source code, check out our GitHub repository: dnpLab .
